author: USA TODAY, Brett Molina, USA TODAY
title: Gap Inc. to make masks, scrubs, gowns for health care workers fighting COVID-19 crisis
description: Gap said it is going to shift its factory partners toward making personal protective equipment such as masks and scrubs for health care workers.
content:
USA Today reporter Nathan Bomey gives a lowdown on the companies going through massive hiring sprees and why not to worry about your utility bill.
USA TODAY
